text:
I ordered catering from Fong Fu for a church event, and wow (as seen from the pic) the food was completely wiped out by the end! Their dishes were a huge hit with everyone.

Not only was the food delicious, but the service was also super responsive and professional. The setup they provided really boosted the atmosphereof our event.

Highly recommend Fong Fu Food Catering. will definitely order again! Well done!
Food was super good! Was for a company event but was above and beyond my own expectations! My favourite was the salted egg pork ribs and the butter salmon 😮‍💨😮‍💨😮‍💨 11/10 would recommend!!!

We recently used for a funeral buffet, and the food was excellent! We received many compliments, especially on the flavorful Eufu noodles.

They also managed to accommodate our requests on short notice, which we really appreciated. Highly recommend! 👍🏻

Catered for about 300 people.

Solid service, timely, and most of the dishes were great!

We would like to extend our heartfelt thanks to Charlie and his team for going the extra mile—from menu curation, to meal sampling, to arranging the tables and chairs for us, and the set up and service during the lunch session.

Other than this buffet, we hold a lunch twice a month and because of Charlie and his team's diligence and quality of food, have decided to give the entire year's order to them. Thanks again Fong Fu!
Ordered their buffet package for a party gathering for 60pax. Super good quality of food and service 👍🏻 will highly recommend. Food came hot and warm as well.
